headline: PPG Withdraws TSCA Section 21 Petition To Amend Final TCE Risk Management Rule For Specialty Polymeric Microporous Sheet Materials Manufacturing
summary: As reported in our May 13, 2025, blog item, on March 24, 2025, PPG Industries, Inc. submitted a petition seeking an amendment to the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency's December 2024 final risk...
